name: Pearl Izumi X-Road Fuel V5 Cycling Shoes - Women's
description: Designed for cyclists, spinners, and bike commuters who don't want to carry a change of shoes. These efficient cycling shoes are functional and have the simple good looks of running shoes. Clip out, lock up, and carry on with your day.Bonded seamless uppers are quick drying, breathable mesh to keep your feet cool.Low-profile construction for fast revolutions.Built-in lace garage prevents jamming in your chain.X-Road nylon plate offers a solid platform, allowing you to move with power and efficiency on and off-bike.Rubber soles for traction and durability.Flexible forefoot and beveled heel for smooth steps.
